Scalar.name: TipResolution
Scalar.help: Set the number of faces on the tip.

Scalar.name: TipRadius
Scalar.help: Set the radius of the widest part of the tip.

Scalar.name: TipLength
Scalar.help: Set the length of the tip (the whole arrow is length 1)

Scalar.name: ShaftResolution
Scalar.help: Set the number of faces on shaft

Scalar.name: ShaftRadius
Scalar.help: Set the radius of the shaft

Scalar.name: Scale
Scalar.help: Set the size of the axes

Vector.name: Origin
Vector.help: Set the x, y, z coordinates of the origin of the axes

Boolean.name: Symmetric
Boolean.help: Select whether to display the negative axes

Scalar.name: Resolution
Scalar.help: Set the number of faces on this cone

Scalar.name: Radius
Scalar.help: Set the radius of the widest part of the cone

Scalar.name: Height
Scalar.help: Set the height of the cone

Boolean.name: Capping
Boolean.help: Set whether to draw the base of the cone

Scalar.name: XLength
Scalar.help: The length of the cube in the x direction.

Scalar.name: YLength
Scalar.help: The length of the cube in the y direction.

Scalar.name: ZLength
Scalar.help: The length of the cube in the z direction.

Vector.name: Center
Vector.help: Set the center of the cube.

Scalar.name: Resolution
Scalar.help: The number of facets used to define the cylinder.

Scalar.name: Height
Scalar.help: The height of the cylinder (along the y axis).

Scalar.name: Radius
Scalar.help: The radius of the cylinder.

Vector.name: Center
Vector.help: Set the center of the cylinder.

Boolean.name: Capping
Boolean.help: Set whether to draw the ends of the cylinder

Vector.name: Extent
Vector.help: Set the min and max values of the data in each dimension

Vector.name: SubSpace
Vector.help: Choose which axes of the data set to display

Vector.name: Origin
Vector.help: Set the imaginary and real values for C (constant) and X (initial value)

Vector.name: Spacing
Vector.help: Set the inaginary and real values for the spacing for C (constant) and X (initial value)

String.name: FilePrefix
String.help: Set the prefix for the files for this image data.

Scalar.name: ScalarType
Scalar.help: Set the scalar type for the data: unsigned char (3), short (4), unsigned short (5), int (6), float (10), double(11)

Vector.name: Extent
Vector.help: Set the min and max values of the data in each dimension

Scalar.name: CornerFactor
Scalar.help: The relative size of the corners to the length of the corresponding bounds. (0.001 -> 0.5)

File.name: FileName
File.help: Select the file for the data set

Scalar.name: Radius
Scalar.help: Set the radius of the data set

Vector.name: Center
Vector.help: Set the coordinates for the center of the sphere.

Scalar.name: Radius
Scalar.help: Set the radius of the sphere

Scalar.name: Theta Resolution
Scalar.help: Set the number of points in the longitude direction (ranging from Start Theta to End Theta)

Scalar.name: Start Theta
Scalar.help: Set the starting angle in the longitude direction

Scalar.name: End Theta
Scalar.help: Set the ending angle in the longitude direction

Scalar.name: Phi Resolution
Scalar.help: Set the number of points in the latitude direction (ranging from Start Phi to End Phi)

Scalar.name: Start Phi
Scalar.help: Set the starting angle in the latitude direction

Scalar.name: End Phi
Scalar.help: Set the ending angle in the latitude direction

File.name: FileName
File.help: Select the data file for the STL data set

Vector.name: Center
Vector.help: Set the center of the superquadric

Vector.name: Scale
Vector.help: Set the scale of the superquadric

Scalar.name: ThetaResolution
Scalar.help: The number of points in the longitude direction.

Scalar.name: PhiResolution
Scalar.help: The number of points in the latitude direction.

Scalar.name: Thickness
Scalar.help: Changing thickness maintains the outside diameter of the toroid.

Scalar.name: ThetaRoundness
Scalar.help: Values range from 0 (rectangular) to 1 (circular) to higher order.

Scalar.name: PhiRoundness
Scalar.help: Values range from 0 (rectangular) to 1 (circular) to higher order.

Scalar.name: Size
Scalar.help: Isotropic size

Boolean.name: Toroidal
Boolean.help: Whether or not the superquadric is toroidal or ellipsoidal
